SEARCH
Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.dao

Class StockDAO

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.dao.StockDAO
public class StockDAO extends Object
Provides access to historical stock data loaded from a CSV resource. Uses an EnumMap to store a list of StockData entries for each StockName. The CSV file must follow a specific three-header format before data rows.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static StockDAO getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of StockDAO.
      Returns:
      the single StockDAO instance

    • loadCSV

      public void loadCSV(String filePath) throws IOException
      Loads stock data from the CSV file at the given path. Expects three header rows: symbols, field names, and an ignored row. Each subsequent line is parsed into StockData objects grouped by stock.
      Parameters:
      filePath - path to the CSV file
      Throws:
      IOException - if reading the file fails

    • getStockData

      public List<StockData> getStockData(StockName stockName)
      Returns all loaded StockData entries for the given stock symbol.
      Parameters:
      stockName - the stock symbol enum
      Returns:
      list of StockData for that symbol, or an empty list if none

    • getStockData

      public StockData getStockData(StockName stockName, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves a single StockData entry for a given stock symbol on a specified date. This method iterates over the list of StockData objects for the stock until it finds one that matches the provided date.
      Parameters:
      stockName - the stock symbol enum.
      date - the specific LocalDate for which data is requested.
      Returns:
      the StockData entry if found, or null if no matching entry exists.
